abstract_summ: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 has resulted in >90,000 infections and >3,000 deaths . Coronavirus spike (S) glycoprotein trimers promote entry into cells and are the main target of antibodies . We show that SARS .CoV . S mediates entry in VeroE6 cells and in BHK cells transfected with human ACE2, establishing ACE2 as a functional receptor for this novel .
